meta.institutional_use: Banks and funds use these levels heavily

formulas.midpoints: Calculate mid-M levels between main pivots for precision

pivot.description: Central equilibrium - above = bullish, below = bearish
pivot.trading_note: Most important level - often tested multiple times

r2.trading_note: Strong week needed to reach, often holds

s2.trading_note: Weak week needed to reach, often holds

pivot_bounce.entry: Price approaches pivot, shows rejection candle
pivot_bounce.target: R1 from below, S1 from above
pivot_bounce.best_context: Trend intact, pivot acting as dynamic support/resistance

r1_s1_fade.description: Fade moves to R1/S1 expecting pullback
r1_s1_fade.entry: Price reaches R1 or S1, shows exhaustion

breakout_r2_s2.description: Trade breakout of R2 or S2
breakout_r2_s2.entry: Strong close beyond R2/S2 with volume
breakout_r2_s2.best_context: Strong trend, momentum confirming, news catalyst

week_start_position.description: Monday: Determine if above/below pivot for bias
week_start_position.above_pivot: Bullish bias, look for longs at S1/Pivot
week_start_position.below_pivot: Bearish bias, look for shorts at R1/Pivot

monday.trading_note: Often ranges between pivot and R1/S1

tuesday.trading_note: Most volatile day, good for breakouts

friday.typical_behavior: Profit taking, mean reversion to pivot
friday.trading_note: Often gravitates back to pivot by close

r2_s2_plus_previous_week.example: This week's R2 = last week's breakout point

multiple_pivot_confluence.example: Weekly pivot = Monthly pivot = Daily pivot

asia.behavior: Often ranges between pivot and R1/S1

london.breakouts: Can reach R2/S2 on strong days

virgin_pivot.description: Pivot not yet tested this week
virgin_pivot.trading: High probability it will be tested - position accordingly

pivot_flip.description: Support becomes resistance or vice versa
pivot_flip.trading: Strong signal when pivot role reverses

risk_management.stop_placement: Never wider than distance to next pivot level
risk_management.position_sizing: Reduce size if trading far from pivot
risk_management.avoid: Trading between R2-R3 or S2-S3 - extreme territory
